name: Garden Chaos
description:
This is my first relased game adapted by my girlfriend's idea, who's also made the music for it. 
This is about a flower that's needs to be watered by raindrops and throughout the game you have to avoid ice stones and bugs. So it's kinda 2D arcade game.  Also all the assets and codeing are made by me with my trusty mouse.

If it's laggy on your browser you can download the desktop version too.
Sadly the Credits and the Quit buttons are not working in the browser version.

I hope you will enjoy playing it and if you do so, please share and/or vote :)
